Review Name: Terrific purchase Review Description: Best in the category and please don't go with the negative comments mentioned. Even I was bit worried post placing the order as some of them commented about the noise issue. But frankly speaking there is nothing to be worried about it. Installation and demo for the same was smooth . It cools down the room with area of 150+ sq ft within 15 mins. Go for it without any second thought if you are looking for product within Voltas.
